external_games.name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Hokuto no Ken F - Seikimatsu Kyuuseishu Densetsu
Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Hokuto no Ken F: Seikimatsu Kyuuseishu Densetsu

name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Hokuto no Ken F: Seikimatsu Kyuuseishu Densetsu
storyline: When the Fist of the North Star merges with Pachi-slot, you get Hokuto no Ken F. The devastation, the adrenaline pumping action and the massive winnings remains. The game is an upgrade from it's predecessor. The system, the flags and the statuses are renewed. The game gives you a chance to study the strategies, so you can bag your winnings when you go to the arcades. Not only can you try your hand at the machines, you can watch the clips from the anime. With the enhanced graphical audio capabilities of the PlayStation3 console, every punch and every blow appears with more earth shaking impact.
summary: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Hokuto no Ken F: Seikimatsu Kyuuseishu Densetsu is a gambling game for the PlayStation 3. The game is based on The Fist Of The North Star series. Although the game is only available in Japan, you can still purchase it off of Amazon.
